text: Salvazaon is a genus of longhorn beetles of the subfamily Lamiinae,Biolib.cz - Salvazaon. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. containing the following species: subgenus Pseudophlyarus * Salvazaon curticornis (Pic, 1939) subgenus Salvazaon * Salvazaon breve Pic, 1940 * Salvazaon metallicum Pic, 1928 * Salvazaon saginatum Holzschuh, 1999 ==References== Category:Desmiphorini
title: Salvazaon
